Posts.Content: I m new to the forum with a question I am having trouble getting feedback on. I got an infection, presumptive dx epididymitis, after Calypso beacon implantation.I am on my fifth day of Levaquin of a two week rx. Implantation was on 8/1 with scrotal fullness and right testicular discomfort several days later. On 8/10-11 temp rose to 100.8 and went to normal after 2-3 days antibiotic and early tylenol. Only minor discomfort remains. I am concerned that getting radiation as scheduled on 8/17 is an invitation to problems I would be less likely to suffer if I were to wait for 4-7 more days. Does anyone have feedback on this?
Posts.Title: Radiation during pelvic infection.

Posts.Content: Glad to o this. Not sure how.
Posts.Title: Radiation during pelvic infection.

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by HighlanderCFH Hi Marko, Welcome to the forum. We have people here who might have some thoughts to offer, so stay tuned. In the meantime, here is an info link from Cleveland Clinic on your implantation procedure. https://my.clevelandclinic.org/healt...ncer-treatment Wishing you the best of luck! Chuck Thanks Chuck. Glad to hear your surgery went well.
